text: Nadiad assembly constituency (નડીયાદ વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Kheda district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Nadiad Taluka (Part) Villages – Tundel, Dumral, Piplag, Uttarsanda, Bhumel, Narsanda, Gutal, Keriavi, Piplata, Akhdol, Valetva, Vadtal, Rajnagar, Kanjari, Nadiad (M) ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 230 || 118136 || 112021 || 8 || 230165 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Pankajkumar Desai, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Pankajkumar Desai, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Pankajkumar Desai, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Kheda district
title: Nadiad (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
